item.title: Cinematic motivational fitness video - Upwork
item.description:
---

Looking for a video editor with proficiency in color grading and color correction.

**Project:**

The project consists of SHORT fitness motivational video content for a personal brand.
**The task:**

Raw footage of several takes in log format is provided. The target audience speaks Spanish, so it is only required to do the video with music.

**What is needed:**

- Color correction
- Cinematic color grading
- Music
- Sound effects

**It does NOT need:**

- Captions
- Voiceover

Expectations:
Aprox. 30s of a cinematic video, FOCUS on color grading.

Here is some examples of what is expected as a final result:

https://www.instagram.com/p/C35fFtexy-5/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C7M4N1yxkPL/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C69bBLSRubX/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C6_mLlRLnnP/

Budget: $20

Skills:Color Grading, Video Color Correction, DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing

item.title: Video Editor and Motion Graphics Artist for Commercial Sports and Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Editor and Motion Graphics Artist to join our team. You will be responsible for creating engaging video content for commercial sports, social media platforms, and paid ads. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio demonstrating expertise in video editing and motion graphics design.

Looking to establish a longer-term monthly retainer fee for ongoing work for the right candidate!

  Responsibilities:
  - Collaborate with the creative team to conceptualize and produce compelling video content
  - Edit footage to create visually stunning videos
  - Enhance videos using motion graphics and visual effects
  - Ensure the final product meets the client's requirements and brand guidelines

  Skills:
  - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro and Final Cut Pro
  - Strong understanding of motion graphics design principles
  - Excellent attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  - Knowledge of the latest industry trends and best practices in video editing and motion graphics

  This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level expert who can deliver high-quality results within the given timeframe.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 21:58 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

I need a video editor who can align herself with my branding and create story telling Instagram reels content to help take my personal branding to the next level

I will deliver the videos myself and depending on how many videos we will edit a month. You will get a fixed salary for this.

I'm looking for somebody to make a visual movie (AI/Mid-journey)  of the attached Chapter 1, of the book of Acts. Use the recording a make a visual reproduction that is engaging. Follow my artwork rules. I'm more looking to see what is out there for a larger bigger project so this is simple a sample project. It should be formated in a way it can uploaded to Youtube. item.title: Video Editor (Fast-Paced Clips and Kinetic Typography) - Upwork
item.description:
SuperViral is a dynamic and innovative marketing agency dedicated to creating engaging and visually stunning content. We are looking for someone that specializes in fast-paced clips and kinetic typography   to captivate our audience. Our team thrives on creativity, collaboration, and pushing the boundaries of visual storytelling.

Job Description:
We are seeking a talented Video Editor with a passion for fast-paced editing and kinetic typography. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, strong timing sense, and the ability to bring energy to our video projects. If you love experimenting with motion graphics and typography, we want to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:

Edit video content to create engaging, fast-paced clips.
Incorporate kinetic typography to enhance storytelling.
Collaborate with the creative team on innovative video concepts.
Ensure video content aligns with brand guidelines.
Use advanced editing techniques, motion graphics, and visual effects.
Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines.
Stay updated with industry trends in video editing and motion graphics.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a Video Editor with a strong portfolio.
Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Expertise in motion graphics and typography (Adobe After Effects).
Strong understanding of visual storytelling, pacing, and timing.
Excellent attention to detail and ability to work under pressure.
Creative mindset with fresh ideas.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to take feedback and implement changes.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 21:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Marketing and SEO Campaign - Upwork
item.description:
Social Media Marketing and Management:
Platforms: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and TikTok.
Marketing campaigns on Facebook and Instagram will be created and managed by me. However, the ad expenses will be covered by you, with an estimated daily cost of $5-$10.

Donation Campaign:
To collect donations, we need your account details. The donation campaign will run on Facebook and Instagram.

Website SEO:

We will integrate keywords and content as discussed. I will update your current Wix website to include keywords, content, slugs, URLs, meta titles, descriptions, alt-texts, and image optimization. This service will cost $350 as a one-time fee.

Content Creation:

Weekly, you will share news and topics for our content writer to develop. The content will be approved by you before publishing.

SEO Reporting:

I will provide a monthly SEO report and backlink sheets.

Social Media Management Reporting:

You can choose between monthly or weekly reporting for social media management. Based on your preference, I will share the content calendar and post designs with you. Reels and short videos will be provided by you.

Pricing:

Hourly Rate:
$35 per hour, which includes post design and video editing.
If video editing and post design are not required, the hourly rate is $25.

Monthly Rate:
$1250 per month, which includes all services mentioned. This is a one-time discounted rate.
Please review these details and share your thoughts. I will provide daily updates on all tasks, including content, posts, and video editing.

WiX Website support

Budget: $1,600
Posted On: June 24, 2024 21:49 UTC

item.ns0:encoded:
Social Media Marketing and Management:
Platforms: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and TikTok.
Marketing campaigns on Facebook and Instagram will be created and managed by me. However, the ad expenses will be covered by you, with an estimated daily cost of $5-$10.

Donation Campaign:
To collect donations, we need your account details. The donation campaign will run on Facebook and Instagram.

Website SEO:

We will integrate keywords and content as discussed. I will update your current Wix website to include keywords, content, slugs, URLs, meta titles, descriptions, alt-texts, and image optimization. This service will cost $350 as a one-time fee.

Content Creation:

Weekly, you will share news and topics for our content writer to develop. The content will be approved by you before publishing.

SEO Reporting:

I will provide a monthly SEO report and backlink sheets.

Social Media Management Reporting:

You can choose between monthly or weekly reporting for social media management. Based on your preference, I will share the content calendar and post designs with you. Reels and short videos will be provided by you.

Pricing:

Hourly Rate:
$35 per hour, which includes post design and video editing.
If video editing and post design are not required, the hourly rate is $25.

Monthly Rate:
$1250 per month, which includes all services mentioned. This is a one-time discounted rate.
Please review these details and share your thoughts. I will provide daily updates on all tasks, including content, posts, and video editing.

WiX Website support

Budget: $1,600

Category: Social Media Marketing

item.title: Seeking Editor/Designer with skills in Descript & Keynote - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I'm looking for a designer / editor to help me with my program.

I'm doing a masterclass on spirituality called The One. I will be filming everything and using reference images that I would need redesigned so that it is consistent with the branding.

I would need this images to be put into presentation format on Keynote which I would present in the course.

I will need them to understand how to use descript so that we can collaborate and work together on adding stock videos, movie clips, call outs, edits, etc into the program.

If you are a spiritual person, understand meditation, believe in God that is a big plus!!

Please open up your proposal with the word FURLOUGH so that I know you read this in it's entirety.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

item.title: Create video ads for Meta - Upwork
item.description:
Bookroo needs someone that can take our UGC and turn it into compelling Meta ads.

Our current video ads are underperforming
- Hook Rates ~18-20% (goal 30-40%)
- Hold Rates ~3% (goal 10%)
- CTR ~0.8% (goal 2-3%)

Our primary target market is moms ages 24-35 with young children, or grandma's with young grandkids.

We're looking for someone that can step in and create compelling videos that will perform well on Meta. Bookroo has a beautiful, visually appealing product. It also solves an important problem for parents—providing their children with a steady stream of age-appropriate, expert curated books.

- https://bookroo.com

- https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=all&ad_type=all&country=ALL&view_all_page_id=389507974544386&search_type=page&media_type=all



Hourly Range: $25.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 21:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.

item.title: Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Hello - I have 230 minutes of videos (just under 4 hours) broken up into 10 videos (each one is a different length). For editing, I just need to add a few things: some zoom in and outs occasionally, some summary slides, and some white titles in the middle. I can send a sample and I can go over more details. I would also provide a script with time stamps so you know exactly what I want done. No color correction, audio or anything else would be needed. I'm looking for both an approx price and a time quote to finish them all, ideally as soon as possible. Thanks

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 24, 2024 21:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing

item.title: Top Instagram/Tiktok Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Video Editor to join our team on a freelance basis.
The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing, proficiency in software like Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro, and a keen eye for detail.

To apply, please send your resume, a link to your portfolio, and a short cover letter explaining why you are a good fit for this role.

Additionally, we require a sample of your work: edit the raw footage we provide into a maximum 18-second video. You can add any effects, music, or graphics you feel will enhance the final product. Please include a brief description of the edits you made and why you chose them.  This can be a long-term partnership!

We look forward to seeing your creativity and skills in action!

Do not apply if you're not willing to make a free sample to prove your worth!

Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 21:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Country: Greece
click to apply
